biography.en:
Systems engineer, specialist in Computer Science and Industrial Automation from Universidad Distrital Francisco Jos√© de Caldas, with master's degrees in Artificial Intelligence and in Business Administration and Management from Universidad Internacional de La Rioja. He holds certifications as a digital forensic examiner such as AccessData Certified Examiner (ACE) and Summation Certified EndUser (SCE).

He has advised several public and private companies in Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, and the United States on the design, development, and implementation of all types of information technologies. He advised on the creation of the Digital Forensics Laboratory at the Superintendency of Industry and Commerce. Later, as the director of the Laboratory, he led highly complex tasks for the acquisition and processing of digital evidence, including those aimed at identifying vulnerabilities and/or data breaches in the personal information of citizens of various nationalities, as well as those intended to determine the existence of collusion between competitors across different industries.
biography.es:
Ingeniero de sistemas, especialista en Inform√°tica y Autom√°tica Industrial de la Universidad Distrital Francisco Jos√© de Caldas, magister en Inteligencia Artificial y magister en Administraci√≥n y Direcci√≥n de Empresas de la Universidad Internacional de la Rioja. Cuenta con certificaciones como examinador forense inform√°tico como AccessData Certified Examiner (ACE) y Summation Certified EndUser (SCE). 

He asesorado a varias empresas p√∫blicas y privadas de Colombia, Ecuador, Per√∫ y E.E.U.U, en dise√±o, desarrollo e implementaci√≥n de todo tipo de tecnolog√≠as de la informaci√≥n. Asesore la creaci√≥n del Laboratorio de Inform√°tica Forense de la Superintendencia de Industria y Comercio. Posteriormente, como director del Laboratorio, lidere tareas de alta complejidad para la adquisici√≥n y procesamiento de evidencias digitales, entre ellas, las dirigidas a establecer la existencia de vulnerabilidades y/o robos de informaci√≥n en los datos personales de ciudadanos de diferentes nacionalidades, as√≠ como las dirigidas a establecer la existencia de acuerdos entre competidores de diferentes industrias.

biography.en:
I am an engineer, AI researcher and lifelong learner passionate about building human-centric AI systems that empower creativity, enhance decision-making, and bridge the gap between human cognition and artificial intelligence.

Currently, I work as a Member of Technical Staff at Adobe, where I contribute to Generative AI-powered tools that help millions of users create engaging content effortlessly. My work focuses on AI-driven automation, experimentation, and building intelligent systems that feel natural and intuitive to users. Beyond the industry, I am pursuing a Master‚Äôs in Computer Science (Interactive Intelligence) at Georgia Tech, specialising in cognitive science, AI ethics, and human-AI collaboration. This journey has deepened my understanding of how people think, how machines learn, and how we can design AI systems that work in harmony with human intelligence.

Speaking at PyCon Colombia 2025 is an opportunity for me to share my experiences, learn from the vibrant Python community, and inspire meaningful discussions about the future of AI. I want to connect with fellow developers, researchers, and innovators who are shaping AI‚Äôs role in society‚Äîensuring that it remains not just powerful, but responsible, ethical, and deeply human-centered.

Let‚Äôs explore together how we can build AI that truly understands and collaborates with us‚Äîbecause the future of AI isn‚Äôt just about smarter machines; it‚Äôs about smarter, more meaningful interactions between humans and technology.
biography.es:
Soy ingeniera, investigadora en inteligencia artificial y aprendiz de por vida, apasionada por construir sistemas de IA centrados en las personas que potencien la creatividad, mejoren la toma de decisiones y cierren la brecha entre la cognici√≥n humana y la inteligencia artificial.

Actualmente trabajo como integrante del equipo t√©cnico en Adobe, donde contribuyo al desarrollo de herramientas impulsadas por IA generativa que ayudan a millones de usuarios a crear contenido atractivo con facilidad. Mi trabajo se centra en la automatizaci√≥n basada en IA, la experimentaci√≥n y la construcci√≥n de sistemas inteligentes que se sientan naturales e intuitivos para los usuarios. M√°s all√° del √°mbito profesional, estoy cursando una maestr√≠a en Ciencias de la Computaci√≥n (Inteligencia Interactiva) en Georgia Tech, con especializaci√≥n en ciencia cognitiva, √©tica de la IA y colaboraci√≥n entre humanos e inteligencia artificial. Este recorrido ha profundizado mi comprensi√≥n sobre c√≥mo piensan las personas, c√≥mo aprenden las m√°quinas y c√≥mo podemos dise√±ar sistemas de IA que funcionen en armon√≠a con la inteligencia humana.

Hablar en PyCon Colombia 2025 es una oportunidad para compartir mis experiencias, aprender de la vibrante comunidad de Python e inspirar conversaciones significativas sobre el futuro de la IA. Quiero conectar con desarrolladores, investigadores e innovadores que est√°n definiendo el papel de la IA en la sociedad, asegurando que no solo sea poderosa, sino tambi√©n responsable, √©tica y profundamente centrada en lo humano.

Exploramos juntos c√≥mo construir una IA que realmente nos entienda y colabore con nosotros, porque el futuro de la IA no se trata solo de m√°quinas m√°s inteligentes, sino de interacciones m√°s inteligentes y significativas entre los humanos y la tecnolog√≠a.

biography.en:
I want people to know me because I am going to become one of the best programmers in Colombia, giving international talks, creating innovative projects and leaving a mark in the world of technology. I aspire to be the Isaac Asimov of programming, not only because of the number of projects I will develop, because of the futuristic and creative vision that defines them.

I do not limit myself to algorithms or industry; I merge academia with creativity to explore new frontiers of knowledge. Although I have Colombian roots, my Russian-German heritage has shaped my way of programming, bringing me closer to the rigor and methodical approach characteristic of engineering in those cultures.
biography.es:

biography.en: Cybersecurity data scientist with over 10 years in the software industry, having developed several successful projects for public and private institutions. Currently working as a Senior Data Scientist, AI responsibility advisor, researcher, and consultant. My passion is creating solutions to make cyberspace safer using data science. I‚Äôm interested in threat detection, adversarial techniques, secure learning, responsible AI, and ethical hacking. I am the author of the books "Cybersecurity: A Data Science-Based Approach", "Cybersecurity: Data Has the Answer", and ‚ÄúCybersecurity: Data, the Seeds of Chaos‚Äù, published by Editorial ICESI in 2018, 2022, and 2023 respectively, as well as numerous papers on security, data science, and e-health.
biography.es: Cient√≠fico de datos de ciberseguridad con m√°s de 10 a√±os en la industria del software, con varios proyectos exitosos desarrollados para instituciones p√∫blicas y privadas. Actualmente me desempe√±o como Senior Data Scientist, asesor de responsabilidad de inteligencia artificial, investigador y consultor. Mi pasi√≥n es crear soluciones para hacer que el ciberespacio sea m√°s seguro utilizando la ciencia de datos. Estoy interesado en la detecci√≥n de amenazas, las t√©cnicas antag√≥nicas, el aprendizaje seguro, la IA responsable y el ethical hacking. Soy autor de los libros "Ciberseguridad: un enfoque basado en la ciencia de datos", "Ciberseguridad: los datos tienen la respuesta", ‚ÄúCiberseguridad: los datos, las semillas del caos‚Äù publicados por la Editorial ICESI en 2018, 2022 y 2023, respectivamente, y m√∫ltiples trabajos en seguridad, ciencia de datos y e-salud.

biography.en:
Catalina Naranjo is a data leader, professor, and advocate for making analytics meaningful in real-world settings. As a university lecturer in data science and machine learning, Catalina is passionate about helping others grow into confident, business-savvy data thinkers.

In addition to my experience as a developer, I‚Äôve also been an instructor of six Python courses at Platzi, where I‚Äôve had the opportunity to teach thousands of students and share my passion for programming. biography.en:

I am a Data Scientist and engineer with experience at companies like Mercado Libre and Rappi, where I have worked on pricing models, fraud detection, and large-scale production systems. biography.en: Hello! I‚Äôm Jorge Martinez, currently working as a geospatial software engineer at the World Food Programme. My focus of work is mostly on geo-data collection and analysis to handle emergencies at a global level. My background is in electronic engineering, with a master in computer science. I did research in computer vision and machine learning and then jumped into GIS focusing on development of different open source tools, ranging from spatial database infrastructure, to OpenStreetMap-derived tools. On my free time, I like to mix music, visit historical museums and try exotic food.

Mi trabajo se centra principalmente en la recolecci√≥n y an√°lisis de datos geoespaciales para atender emergencias a nivel global. Hice investigaci√≥n en visi√≥n por computador y aprendizaje autom√°tico, y luego me enfoqu√© en los SIG (Sistemas de Informaci√≥n Geogr√°fica), desarrollando diferentes herramientas de c√≥digo abierto, desde infraestructura de bases de datos espaciales hasta herramientas basadas en OpenStreetMap. En mi tiempo libre, me gusta mezclar m√∫sica, visitar museos hist√≥ricos y probar comida ex√≥tica.

biography.en:
Carlos Mario Ram√≠rez Gil is a professional with a solid track record of more than 28 years, blending the financial and administrative world with the power of technology. His career spans strategic financial management, consulting, and, crucially, high-level university teaching for the past 15 years at prestigious Colombian institutions.

What sets Carlos Mario apart is his proactive journey into programming and data science. Unsatisfied with traditional tools, he embraced Python as a core pillar, actively integrating it into his postgraduate finance courses. His practical use of Python extends to developing algorithms to solve complex financial problems‚Äîfrom predicting Bitcoin prices and optimizing cryptocurrency portfolios to regression models for real estate prices and time series forecasting applied to urban data, showcasing impressive versatility.

His passion for sharing knowledge doesn't stop in the classroom. He is a published author with three Spanish-language books focused on the technologies he is passionate about: Python, Blockchain, and Artificial Intelligence. These publications testify to his dedication to making complex topics accessible to a broader audience.

Why should you meet Carlos Mario? Because he embodies the transition many professionals aspire to: moving from reliance on classic tools (like spreadsheets he mastered for years) to the power and flexibility of programming and AI. His proposed talk comes directly from this lived experience, offering a unique and valuable perspective, backed by decades in the financial field and a proven ability to teach and apply Python effectively. He comes to PyCon Colombia not just to share his technical knowledge but to inspire others with his story of reinvention and technological adaptation in a traditional sector.
biography.es:
Carlos Mario Ram√≠rez Gil es un profesional con una s√≥lida trayectoria de m√°s de 28 a√±os fusionando el mundo financiero y administrativo con el poder de la tecnolog√≠a. Su carrera abarca desde la gesti√≥n financiera estrat√©gica hasta la consultor√≠a y, crucialmente, la docencia universitaria de alto nivel durante los √∫ltimos 15 a√±os en prestigiosas instituciones colombianas.

Lo que distingue a Carlos Mario es su viaje proactivo hacia la programaci√≥n y la ciencia de datos. No contento con las herramientas tradicionales, adopt√≥ Python como un pilar fundamental, integr√°ndolo activamente en sus cursos de posgrado en finanzas. Su aplicaci√≥n pr√°ctica de Python se extiende al desarrollo de algoritmos para resolver problemas financieros complejos: desde la predicci√≥n del precio de Bitcoin y la optimizaci√≥n de portafolios de criptomonedas, hasta modelos de regresi√≥n para precios inmobiliarios y pron√≥sticos de series de tiempo aplicados a datos urbanos, demostrando una versatilidad impresionante.

Su pasi√≥n por compartir conocimiento no se detiene en el aula. Es un autor consumado con tres libros publicados en espa√±ol, enfocados precisamente en las tecnolog√≠as que le apasionan: Python, Blockchain e Inteligencia Artificial. Estas publicaciones son un testimonio de su dedicaci√≥n para hacer accesibles temas complejos a una audiencia m√°s amplia.

¬øPor qu√© quieres conocer a Carlos Mario? Porque √©l personifica la transici√≥n que muchos profesionales anhelan: pasar de la dependencia de las herramientas cl√°sicas (como las hojas de c√°lculo que domin√≥ durante a√±os) a la potencia y flexibilidad de la programaci√≥n y la IA. biography.en:

I‚Äôve worked on projects that involve analyzing large amounts of text, processing speech, and building AI-powered systems to extract insights from unstructured data. I enjoy working with teams to solve problems and make AI useful in real-world applications.

I also like explaining complex ideas in simple terms, whether it‚Äôs to engineers, business teams, or clients. I believe good communication is just as important as good code.

Tengo experiencia pr√°ctica construyendo y desplegando modelos de aprendizaje autom√°tico, utilizando herramientas como TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn y LangChain. biography.en:
I‚Äôm Ana Isabel Rua, a Machine Learning Solution Architect with over 7 years of experience transforming complex data challenges into real-world, high-impact solutions using Python. I specialize in building end-to-end AI systems ‚Äî from large-scale document pipelines to cutting-edge applications of large language models (LLMs), generative AI, and computer vision.

My work currently focuses on the healthcare industry, where I‚Äôve led the development of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that processes millions of unstructured clinical records monthly. This system enables patient mapping and clinical trial cohort selection at scale ‚Äî unlocking visibility and accelerating impact for medical teams.

I hold a Master‚Äôs in Information and Communication Technologies and proudly won the Datat√≥nBC 2018, a national data science competition hosted by Grupo Bancolombia. Throughout my career, I‚Äôve developed and deployed object detection models (300+ food classes), audio analytics solutions and automated content pipelines for enterprise clients ‚Äî always with a strong commitment to innovation, quality, and collaboration.

Beyond the code, I‚Äôm passionate about sharing knowledge, elevating others, and creating space for more women and Latinas in tech. I want people to know about me because I represent what‚Äôs possible when technical excellence meets purpose-driven work. At PyCon Colombia, I‚Äôm here to share, learn, and connect with others who believe in the power of Python to solve problems that matter.
biography.es:
Soy Ana Isabel Rua, Arquitecta de Soluciones en Machine Learning con m√°s de 7 a√±os de experiencia transformando retos complejos de datos en soluciones reales y de alto impacto utilizando Python. Me especializo en construir sistemas de inteligencia artificial de extremo a extremo: desde pipelines de documentos a gran escala hasta aplicaciones de vanguardia con modelos de lenguaje de gran tama√±o (LLMs), IA generativa y visi√≥n por computador.

Actualmente, mi trabajo se enfoca en la industria de la salud, donde he liderado el desarrollo de un sistema de Generaci√≥n Aumentada por Recuperaci√≥n (RAG) que procesa millones de registros cl√≠nicos no estructurados cada mes. Este sistema permite el mapeo de pacientes y la selecci√≥n de cohortes para ensayos cl√≠nicos a gran escala, brindando visibilidad y acelerando el impacto para los equipos m√©dicos.

Soy mag√≠ster en Tecnolog√≠as de la Informaci√≥n y las Comunicaciones y ganadora de la Datat√≥nBC 2018, una competencia nacional de ciencia de datos organizada por Grupo Bancolombia. A lo largo de mi carrera, he desarrollado y desplegado modelos de detecci√≥n de objetos (m√°s de 300 clases de alimentos), soluciones de an√°lisis de audio y pipelines de contenido automatizados para clientes empresariales, siempre con un fuerte compromiso con la innovaci√≥n, la calidad y la colaboraci√≥n.

M√°s all√° del c√≥digo, me apasiona compartir conocimiento, elevar a otros y crear espacios para que m√°s mujeres y latinas ingresen al mundo de la tecnolog√≠a. En PyCon Colombia, vengo a compartir, aprender y conectar con quienes creen en el poder de Python para resolver problemas que realmente importan.

biography.en:
I'm a Software Architect and Machine Learning Engineer specializing in leveraging Graph databases and Intelligent Document Processing (IdP) technologies, including advanced data extraction within the healthcare industry. Over the past years, I've implemented industry best practices integrating Large Language Models (LLM) and Generative AI (GenAI) to create robust, secure, and scalable applications, enabling advanced data insights, and enhanced patient outcomes.

Two years ago, I had the pleasure of sharing my experiences at PyCon Colombia, focusing on practical applications of Python in AI-driven solutions. Since then, I've deepened my expertise by building production-ready systems on cloud platforms.

I believe in open knowledge sharing, continuous learning, and building tech that genuinely impacts society. I'm excited to return to PyCon Colombia to reconnect with the vibrant Python community, share insights from recent challenges and successes, and inspire others to explore the immense possibilities Python unlocks in real-world scenarios.
biography.es:
Soy arquitecto de software e ingeniero de machine learning, especializado en el uso de bases de datos gr√°ficas y tecnolog√≠as de procesamiento inteligente de documentos (IdP), incluyendo extracci√≥n avanzada de datos en el sector salud. En los √∫ltimos a√±os, he aplicado las mejores pr√°cticas de la industria integrando modelos de lenguaje de gran escala (LLM) e inteligencia artificial generativa (GenAI) para crear aplicaciones robustas, seguras y escalables, permitiendo obtener insights avanzados y mejorar los resultados para los pacientes.

Hace dos a√±os tuve el placer de compartir mis experiencias en PyCon Colombia, enfoc√°ndome en aplicaciones pr√°cticas de Python en soluciones impulsadas por IA. Desde entonces, he profundizado mi experiencia construyendo sistemas listos para producci√≥n en plataformas en la nube.

Creo en el conocimiento abierto, el aprendizaje continuo y en construir tecnolog√≠a que genere un impacto real en la sociedad. Me emociona volver a PyCon Colombia para reconectarme con la vibrante comunidad de Python, compartir aprendizajes recientes y motivar a otros a explorar todo lo que Python permite en escenarios reales.

Ser speaker en PyCon representa para m√≠ una oportunidad de aportar a la comunidad que impuls√≥ mi desarrollo y de conectar con quienes tambi√©n est√°n construyendo el futuro con Python.
biography.en:
I'm a Data Scientist at Mercado Libre with 7 years of experience turning complex data into high-impact business solutions. I specialize in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and lead projects that classify over 300 million financial transactions per month. I work at the intersection of machine learning and strategy, always focused on automation, scalability, and clarity.

Beyond the code, I'm passionate about democratizing knowledge. That‚Äôs why I created 'El Man de los Datos,' an educational social media account where I explain statistics, Excel, and data science concepts in a practical and entertaining way for Spanish-speaking professionals.

I want people to know me not just for what I build, but for how I share it ‚Äî with curiosity, empathy, and a deep commitment to collective growth. Being a PyCon speaker is a chance for me to give back to the community that fueled my development and to connect with others who are also building the future with Python.
